sense.gloss: courage, bravery, pluck, nerve, grit, guts
pit of the stomach, solar plexus, epigastrium
one's heart, one's mind, one's intentions
the most trying spot or period, the most difficult period
one's heart of hearts, the depths of one's mind

r_ele.r: じんこうききょうりょうほう

sense.gloss: pigeon chest (Pectus carinatum, deformity of the chest, protruding ribs and sternum), pigeon breast
curved front portion of a stirrup
curve at the base of a shamisen neck
to keep to oneself, to bear in mind
making a rough estimate in one's head
obi worn high on the waist

sdata.j: ↑胸↑↓むね↓をさすってあげましょうか。

sdata.j: どうも↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑未↑↓いま↓だ↑胸↑↓むね↓に↑一物↑↓いちもつ↓もっているような↑気↑↓き↓がする。↑文句↑↓もんく↓があればはっきり↑言↑↓い↓ってよ。
